title: Western Movie | The Avenger (1960) | Michael Landon, Pernell Roberts, Dan Blocker | Bonanza

sources.title: Western Movie | The Avenger (1960) | Michael Landon, Pernell Roberts, Dan Blocker | Bonanza
sources.description:
A mysterious stranger called Lassiter (Vic Morrow) helps Hoss and Joe to save Ben and Adam before they're hanged like his father. The drifter is searching for the men who committeed a lynching in Kansas years ago. Ian Wolfe guest stars.
 
Director: Christian Nyby
Writer: Clair Huffaker
Stars: Pernell Roberts, Dan Blocker, Michael Landon
Genres: Classics, Cult, TV, Western
Bonanza 26 The Avenger (1960)
